sn22.139:1.2: “Mendicants, you should give up desire and greed for what is impermanent.
sn22.139:1.4: Form is impermanent; you should give up desire and greed for it.
sn22.139:1.8: Consciousness is impermanent; you should give up desire and greed for it.
sn22.139:1.9: You should give up desire and greed for what is impermanent.”
